*div1 type="summary"* *p*Mrs. Hawkins has received offer for her interest in Austin's colony. Asks advice. Interest of Kentucky in the colony.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Lexington*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="02-18-1826">18 February 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr Sir *person_mentioned*George Ann*/person_mentioned* has had an offer made for the Interest of our *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned* in your *location_mentioned*Grant*/location_mentioned* she is unwilling to do any thing without your advice the offer is made by one of the Most wealthy and Respectable *person_mentioned*me[n]*/person_mentioned* in the State of *location_mentioned*Kentucky*/location_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*9 other Gentlemen*/person_mentioned* of *location_mentioned*Louisiana*/location_mentioned* all of which Could take into the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* a great Number of Respectable *person_mentioned*familys */person_mentioned*under that consideration the sale would be mutually to the Interest of all *person_mentioned*Parties */person_mentioned*Concerned please have the goodness to advice me what to do and what to ask for her Interest by the first Person that Comes into the *location_mentioned*United States*/location_mentioned* If I could spend One hour with [you I] should be satisfied Your *person_mentioned*friend*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*L Hawkins*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*The situation of my *person_mentioned*sister*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*her five helpless*/person_mentioned* and my *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned* of five more is glomy and desponding beyond description all that I had was lost in the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*, say if you have saved any thing from *person_mentioned*Dimit*/person_mentioned* or any other resource*/p* */div1*
